dc_title_s: Local Map Sheet No. 2 Wrights Point to Beverly
dc_description_s: A map of the Delaware River from Wrights Point.|"sheet number: 2|scale: 1 inch = 833 1/3 feet|Date: October 4, 1911|Condition: Fair|Map shows the Delaware River and the area along it. Triangulation, marsh, boring, and low water areas are located on the map. The 6, 12, 18, 24, 30, and 36 feet contours are shown in the river along with soundings. There is a table of tabulation of triangulation and bench marks, a table of borings, a typical cross section, an index map, and a profile and alinement chart."
